questions.question_text_1: THIS IS QUESTION PAPER FOR THE SUBJECT "FOUNDATION LEVEL : SEMESTER II: MATHEMATICS FOR DATA SCIENCE II (COMPUTER BASED EXAM)"  ARE YOU SURE YOU HAVE TO WRITE EXAM FOR THIS SUBJECT? options.option_text: A is a diagonal matrix with non-zero diagonal entries.
At least one column of A is a linear combination of two other columns of A.
b is one of the columns of A.
The reduced row echelon form of A has no zero rows.
A has at least n − 1 linearly independent rows.
